job_description:
Our client in Whitby is looking for a Senior Full-Stack Developer

Role

As a Sr. Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing products, and web applications in .NET and Angular. You are a full-stack developer with a focus on the frontend and backend. You are comfortable working as part of an Agile team.

Work Type

Hybrid – 10 days a month in the office
Flexible hours and days in the office
Location: Whitby

Company Culture

You will work for a growing software company and be part of product development for new innovative technologies. You will work in a fun, collaborative environment, where lunch is catered daily by on-site chefs! You will be working in an office environment that prides itself on an amazing fun culture! You will be encouraged and compensated for obtaining further certifications as a part of your growth!

Key Responsibilities

Work closely with the development team, QA, Scrum Master, and Product management team
Provide project timelines, estimations, and roadmaps.
Gather requirements, make recommendations, and implement design enhancements and changes.
Act as a team mentor, to junior developers and assist in their code reviews, improving work quality and performance
Implement and drive continuous integration and delivery approach for deployments.

Skills

You have 5 - 7 years of experience in the following:

Software Development working on applications built on Microsoft .Net Tech stack
JavaScript and jQuery, and Typescript
Frontend framework (Angular)
Database technologies; SQL Server, MongoDB
MVC and MVVM
Experience working in an Agile Scrum environment.
3+ years of experience as a Senior .NET developer

Education

MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Systems.

Salary

$110,000 to $130,000
